snippet: The police will soon stop turning over illegal immigrants arrested for low-level crimes to federal immigration officials for deportation, Police Chief Charlie Beck said on Thursday.
abstract: Los Angeles Police Chief Charlie Beck says police will stop turning over illegal immigrants arrested for low-level crimes to federal immigration officials for deportation.
lead_paragraph: The police will soon stop turning over illegal immigrants arrested for low-level crimes to federal immigration officials for deportation, Police Chief Charlie Beck said on Thursday.

headline.seo: Los Angeles Police to Revise Immigrant Detention Policy
headline.main: Los Angeles to Cease Transferring Some Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles to Cease Transferring Immigrants
